name: Racing Game Prototype
description:
PLEASE NOTE: This is not intended to be a normal race game, it is more of a visual demo/experiment.

Controls:

WASD or Arrow Keys - Movement

9 - Reset Scene

Why did I make this game?

This is a game I created as part of my studies. This is a racing game focused on the visual aspect, which were the parameters given to me for the project. I used Cinema4D and Unity to create this project.

Game Engine:

I used Unity to create this game.
